text: Siyabonga Cyprian Cwele (born 3 September 1958) is a South African politician. A member of the African National Congress, he is the current Minister of Telecommunications and Postal Services and previously served as the Minister of State Security (formerly named Minister of Intelligence Services).https://www.pa.org.za/person/siyabonga-cyprian-cwele/ Siyabonga Cwele :: People's Assemblyhttps://www.mg.co.za/article/2010-02-12-family-trips-show-a-very-married-mr-and-mrs-cwele | Family trips show a very married Mr and Mrs Cwele | News | National | M&G; == References == Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:South African politicians
title: Siyabonga Cwele
